track.name: Get It While You Can
comments: This title is a personal motto of mine
Really good. and I used to.
Saw Janis Live in USA in the seventies at a Festival on The East Coast of America Great
i bet she still snores while she sleeps forever! but she did some wonderful songs!
Cool song. Get it while you can, HUM.
viel zu früh von uns gegangen :(
Precious woman who left too soon
Each time i listen this ... it makes me crazy !!!

"Once I Had A Man, But I Didn't Know Enough At The Time To Count My Blessings, No No No. But I Wish You Could See Me Crying Today, Cause I Would Have Been Able To Listen, And If Anybody Comes Along, He Will Give Me Love And Affection... Yeah, Hey, Ay, Yeah, Ay, Get It While You Can!" Best Part Of This Song, Truly A Part Of Janis That We Can Relate Too. We Miss You Janis.
